title: Museum of Traditional Technological Heritage and an Information Centre in Polonnaruwa
decision_details:
- The establishment of a Heritage Museum and an Information Centre which reflect the pristine traditional technology such as the past towns and garden designing, technological heritage, traditional irrigation and water supply systems, food preservation methods, mode of transport, architecture etc. different to that of a normal museum has been identified as a need of the time.  

	Accordingly, the joint proposal made by H.E. the President Maithripala Sirisena and Hon. S.B. Navinne, the Minister of Internal Affairs, Wayamba Development and Cultural Affairs, to establish a Heritage Museum and an Information Centre in Polonnaruwa which comprises of galleries designed to display the important milestones in the field of traditional technology and the period of governance from the pre-historic era to the present day, was approved by the Cabinet.
